components.author: Jordan Spieth
components.content: It seems unreal, yet I couldn't be happier to have so many people across the country rooting for me to succeed. It is a very humbling thing to see friends and strangers pulling for you to achieve your dreams. I am very grateful for the words of encouragement week in and week out.
